text: hello and welcome to crossplane
community day at kubecon
eu 2021 my name is daniel mangum and i'm
a maintainer of the crossplane project
a senior software engineer at outbound
and a member of the crossplane community
day program committee
before i tell you about all the
incredible speakers that we have lined
up for you today
i want to take a moment to thank you for
being here whether you are a user
contributor or just interested in
learning more about building cloud
native platforms
you are welcome here today and you're
welcome in the crossplane community
the crossplane project has seen
tremendous growth since its initial
release in late 2018.
we have seen folks from all over the
world discover the project and identify
with the pain points it addresses
these individuals and organizations have
come together to shape the direction of
the technology
as well as build an open and welcoming
community
over the last year cross planes maturity
has been especially evident in its
donation to the cncf
the release of a stable 1.0 version and
its wide adoption in enterprise settings
this progress has been manifested in the
number of incredible submissions we
received for the crossplane community
day cfp
placing a difficult task on the program
committee of selecting the best of the
best
with many wonderful talks being
eliminated due to time constraints
maybe next tubecon will have some
breakout sessions to include more of
this awesome content
the result is a packed schedule
featuring industry leaders
crossplane adopters members of the cloud
native community and contributors to the
crossplane project
as a brief overview we'll kick it off
with a keynote from basam tabara
founder and ceo of upbound and
co-creator of the crossplane project
we'll then move on to a panel of folks
from the major cloud providers
as well as a few cross-plane maintainers
next up we'll get into bare metal
provisioning with marcus from
from equinix and the folks at ibm are
going to teach us a little bit about the
crossplane security model
we'll round out the day with another
panel this one from devops leaders
across prominent
organizations in the cloud native
ecosystem
as a reminder this event is governed by
the cncf code of conduct
so please make sure that all
communication is respectful and
considerate of others
to engage with speakers and community
members during today's talks
feel free to join us at
slac.crossplan.io where myself
and many others will be available
throughout the day by scanning this qr
code in the bottom right corner of the
slide you'll be directed to the slack
crossplane workspace
and without any further ado i want to
introduce bassam tabara to kick us off
with today's keynote address
